content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DSSCAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: STUDY PARTICIPATION
      value_is_literal: true
    - name: DSSCAT
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: USUBJID
Core:
  Id: CORE-000214
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when more than 1 record per subject has DSSCAT = 'STUDY
  PARTICIPATION'
Outcome:
  Message: There is more than 1 record per subject has DSSCAT = 'STUDY PARTICIPATION'
  Output Variables:
    - DSSCAT
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0538
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: DSSCAT = "STUDY PARTICIPATION" is used to represent
                  disposition of study participation
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 2.b.1
                Section: 6.2.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DS

json.Description: Trigger error when more than 1 record per subject has DSSCAT = 'STUDY PARTICIPATION'

Outcome.Message: There is more than 1 record per subject has DSSCAT = 'STUDY PARTICIPATION'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: DSSCAT = "STUDY PARTICIPATION" is used to represent disposition of study participation
